item.title: 华尔街千载难逢的反弹引发软着陆风险
item.description: 开局不利。但是，自大流行病以来最严重的波动性暴跌发生四周后，8 月份将成为华尔街对其预测未来能力的又一次信心大展示。【原文：It began badly. But four weeks on from the worst volatility blowup since the pandemic, August will go down as another grand gesture of confidence by Wall Street in its ability to suss out the future.】

item.title: 富国银行在激烈的财报电话会议后下调前程无忧目标价
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）下调了价值 80 亿美元的上市私人信贷基金 Prospect Capital Corp. 的目标价，原因是现有股东面临进一步稀释的风险。【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. cut its price target on Prospect Capital Corp., an $8 billion publicly traded private credit fund, over the risk of further dilution for existing shareholders.】

item.title: 国际可可组织称可可赤字将比先前估计的更严重
item.description: 由于恶劣天气和疾病对生产造成的持续挑战，本季可可短缺问题将进一步加剧。【原文：Cocoa’s shortage is set to deepen further this season amid persistent production challenges from poor weather and disease.】

item.title: Invesco 通过 "巨型 "QQQ 基金加强科技股集中度
item.description: Invesco Ltd. 正准备推出一款交易所交易基金，让投资者能够超集中地投资于最大的科技股。【原文：Invesco Ltd. is gearing up to launch an exchange-traded fund that would allow investors to get ultra-concentrated exposure to the largest technology stocks.】

item.title: 美联储降息在即，投机交易员转而做空美元
item.description: 由于美联储有望在 9 月份启动宽松周期，投机交易商自 2 月份以来首次转而看跌美元。【原文：Speculative traders turned bearish on the dollar for the first time since February as the Federal Reserve looks set to kick off its easing cycle in September.】

item.title: 期权交易员斥资 900 万美元押注 9 月波动率飙升
item.description: 尽管华尔街的许多交易员都在为劳动节长周末做准备，但至少有一位投资者在购买保护，以防 9 月份的大跌。【原文：While many traders on Wall Street had a foot out the door for the long Labor Day weekend, at least one investor was buying protection against a September selloff.】

item.title: 关注页岩气增产，YPF 希望出售锂业务部门
item.description: 阿根廷国营石油公司 YPF SA 正在考虑出售其锂部门，作为全面撤资战略的一部分，以精简对备受赞誉的瓦卡穆埃尔塔页岩区的投资。【原文：Argentine state-run oil company YPF SA is considering a sale of its lithium unit as part of a sweeping divestment strategy to streamline investments into the heralded Vaca Muerta shale patch.】

item.title: 杰克-博格尔的噩梦和更重要的事情
item.description:
价值 10 万亿美元的美国 ETF 行业正在发生文化转变。【原文：

A cultural shift is underway in the $10 trillion US ETF industry.

】

item.title: 奇趣通讯未来十年值得关注的大事
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读每周一期的《奇货》时事通讯，乔-魏森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）将为您带来他们对市场、金融和经济领域最有趣发展的看法。【原文：Hello and welcome to the weekly Odd Lots newsletter, where Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway bring you their thoughts on the most interesting developments in markets, finance and economy.】

item.title: 加拿大家庭人均支出以衰退速度下降
item.description: 加拿大家庭人均支出正以以前只有在经济衰退时期才会出现的速度下降。在扣除通货膨胀因素后，第二季度的人均家庭支出同比下降了 1.3%。【原文：Household spending per person in Canada is falling at a pace only previously seen during recessions. After adjusting for inflation, the measure fell 1.3% in the second quarter from the year before.】

item.title: 小额贷款投资者期待抓住九月份市场疲软的机会
item.description: 预计 9 月份市政债券市场将受到新债券销售冲击的压力，投资者购买较便宜债券的窗口期将扩大。【原文：The municipal-bond market is expected to be pressured in September by an onslaught of new sales, widening the window for investors to buy cheaper bonds.】

item.title: 6.3 万亿美元 "场外现金 "已在游戏中
item.description:
数据并未显示锁定收益率的举措

。【原文：

Data doesn’t show a move to lock in yields for longer

】

item.title: Equinor 将缩减可再生能源部门，开始与工会谈判
item.description: Equinor ASA 将缩减其可再生能源部门的规模，并开始与工会讨论该部门的员工问题。【原文：Equinor ASA will downsize its renewables unit and is beginning discussions with unions regarding employees at the division.】

item.title: 梅洛尼联盟被告知意大利预算必须与欧盟承诺相符
item.description: 意大利财政部长告诉总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）的政府，其预算计划不得偏离向布鲁塞尔做出的修复公共财政的承诺。【原文：Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni’s government was told by Italy’s finance minister that its budget plans mustn’t deviate from any pledges to Brussels to fix the public finances.】

item.title: 卡洛斯-斯利姆（Carlos Slim）支持的 Talos 公司在首席执行官兼创始人意外离职后下挫
item.description: 首席执行官意外离职后，最大股东为亿万富翁卡洛斯-斯利姆（Carlos Slim）的美国石油生产商塔洛斯能源公司（Talos Energy Inc.【原文：Talos Energy Inc., a US oil producer whose biggest shareholder is billionaire Carlos Slim, slid after the unexpected departure of its chief executive officer.】

item.title: 凯雷投资欧洲消费品部主管 Massimiliano Caraffa 将离职
item.description: 据知情人士透露，凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. partner Massimiliano Caraffa is in the process of leaving the firm after spending the past two decades at the US-listed alternative asset manager, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Robot Ventures 为早期加密风险投资基金融资 7500 万美元
item.description: 机器人风险投资公司（Robot Ventures）是 EigenLayer、Lido Finance 和 Flashbots 等加密初创企业的早期投资者，该公司为其最新的风险投资基金筹集了 7500 万美元。【原文：Robot Ventures, an early-stage investor in crypto startups such as EigenLayer, Lido Finance and Flashbots, raised $75 million for its latest venture-capital fund.】

item.title: 香港新世界预计减记亏损 26 亿美元
item.description: 香港负债最多的大型房地产开发商新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：New World Development Co., Hong Kong’s most indebted major property developer, expects to post a loss of as much as HK$20 billion ($2.6 billion) this year after writing down assets following an extended real estate slump.】

item.title: 代表称欧佩克+倾向于继续提高产量
item.description: 据参与讨论的代表称，欧佩克+倾向于按计划在 10 月份恢复石油生产。【原文：OPEC+ is leaning toward reviving oil production as planned in October, according to delegates involved in the discussions.】

item.title: 欧洲央行维勒鲁瓦称 9 月降息 "公平明智
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪支持在数据显示 8 月份通胀明显放缓后于下月降息。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau backed a cut in interest rates next month after data showed a marked slowdown in inflation in August.】

item.title: 沃尔玛八月份额增长 12%，折扣竞争对手却大幅下滑
item.description: 由于消费者控制消费，沃尔玛公司将在八月迎来一个井喷月，而其一些折扣连锁店竞争对手则将在八月遭遇灾难性的打击。【原文：August is on pace to be a blowout month for Walmart Inc. — and a disastrous one for some of its discount-chain competitors — as consumers rein in spending.】

item.title: 成本上升后肯尼亚通胀加速至两个月高点
item.description: 在食品、公用事业、能源和运输价格比去年同期上涨之后，肯尼亚的年度通货膨胀率在 8 月份停止了连续数月的放缓趋势。【原文：Kenyan annual inflation halted months of easing in August, after the prices of food, utilities, energy and transport rose from a year earlier.】

item.title: 预算数据不佳加深财政困境，巴西雷亚尔下挫
item.description: 周五，巴西雷亚尔领跌新兴市场，因为预算数据远差于预期，加剧了人们对该国财政前景的担忧。【原文：Brazil’s real led losses in emerging markets Friday as budget data came in far worse than expected, adding to concerns about the nation’s fiscal outlook.】

item.title: 二手拖拉机和节俭的种植者主导了美国最大的农场展
item.description: 花哨的新技术通常是贸易展上的明星。但在美国最大的室外农业展会 Farm Progress Show 上，二手拖拉机才是最大的亮点。【原文：Fancy new technology usually is the star at trade shows. But at the Farm Progress Show, the largest outdoor agriculture event in the US, used tractors are the big attraction.】

item.title: 数据不支持美联储巨幅降息，国债下跌
item.description: 由于美联储青睐的通胀指标加强了下月开始有节制降息的前景，国债下跌。【原文：Treasuries declined as the Federal Reserve’s favored inflation gauge reinforced the outlook for a measured pace of interest-rate cuts starting next month.】

item.title: 单日基金是杰克-博格尔（Jack Bogle）栩栩如生的噩梦
item.description: 已故的杰克-博格尔（Jack Bogle —）是第一只指数基金之父，他对交易所交易基金的后代深恶痛绝，警告说这只会刺激 "傻瓜、疯子和边缘疯子 "进行投机交易。时至 2024 年，批评者警告说，新一代 ETF 的目的正是如此。【原文：The late Jack Bogle — father of the first index fund — famously loathed their exchange-traded offspring, warning that it only incentivize speculative trading among “fruitcakes, nut cases and lunatic fringe.” Fast forward to 2024, and critics warn a new generation of ETFs are designed to do exactly that.】

item.title: 乌克兰国家石油公司将继续履行合同石油义务
item.description: 乌克兰国营 Naftogaz 首席执行官 Oleksiy Chernyshov 周五在给彭博社的一封电子邮件声明中说，乌克兰将继续按照合同向欧洲国家运输石油。【原文：Ukraine will continue with the transportation of oil to European countries in accordance with its contracts, Ukrainian state-run Naftogaz Chief Executive Officer Oleksiy Chernyshov said Friday in an emailed statement to Bloomberg.】

item.title: 特朗普支持免费试管婴儿为瑞典 Vitrolife 公司注入强心剂
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）试图在激烈的美国总统大选竞选中赢得选民的支持，这出乎意料地提振了瑞典一家小型医疗保健公司的股价。【原文：Donald Trump’s attempts to win over voters in a tight US presidential election campaign has given an unexpected boost to shares of a small Swedish healthcare firm.】

item.title: 加拿大经济增长但细节薄弱，9 月可能降息
item.description: 加拿大第二季度的经济增长超过预期，但人均国内生产总值的下降和家庭消费的疲软将使加拿大央行在下周举行的连续第三次会议上继续下调利率。【原文：Canada’s economy grew more than expected in the second quarter, but falling per-capita gross domestic product and softening household consumption should keep the Bank of Canada on track to cut rates for a third straight meeting next week.】

item.title: 德国经济陷入困境，银行开始受到影响
item.description: 德国银行开始感受到经济停滞带来的压力。【原文：Germany’s banks are starting to feel the pinch from the stagnating economy.】
